reviewComments: A fun building, historic with interesting interior and fun art in the window. Stop by for a drink or soda. The people are friendly.

Fine old building directly across from the Courthouse park on Washington St in downtown Sonora. Packed to the gills with local military items. Many books and information.
This is a small museum, yet it contains some of the most interesting military memorabilia in the area. Quite a fine tribute to our veterans and well worth the time spent.
How nice is this. A little nugget in town that has all sorts of interesting collectibles. Its always nice to see well maintained museums in rural areas. Auburn honors its vets.
Excellent — Quality production! From the set details, lighting, choreography, singing and dancing — a quality production!
Well done theater. Always great. We have been to many of their productions and recommend them to anyone local or visiting.
